price: Siz zəif olduğunuz halda, Allah Bədrdə sizə yardım etdi. Elə isə Allahdan qorxun ki, bəlkə şükür edəsiniz.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ نَصَرَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِبَدۡرٖ وَأَنتُمۡ أَذِلَّةٞۖ فَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad naṣarakumu al-lahu bibadrin wa-antum adhillatun fa-ittaqū al-laha laʿallakum tashkurūna
